text: Eva-Maria Hagen (; ; 19 October 1934 – 16 August 2022) was a German actress and singer. She was born in Költschen, Nazi Germany. Her career began in 1957. Her best known roles were in Don't Forget My Little Traudel, Goods for Catalonia and Meine Freundin Sybille. From 1954 to 1959, she was married to Hans Oliva-Hagen. They had one daughter, singer Nina Hagen. Hagen died on 16 August 2022 in Hamburg, Germany at the age of 87. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2022 deaths Category:German movie actors Category:German stage actors Category:German singers Category:Actors from Hamburg
title: Eva-Maria Hagen
